backend/main.mo: Defines the Motoko canister's core types for competitions, events, payments, results, user profiles, and ordering utilities, and mixes in authorization. Includes custom comparison logic for event ordering.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required admin result hide/unhide functionality and associated affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including components, pages, and hooks used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Razorpay public config defining live keyId, currency, company info, and theme color.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly strings covering sessions, scrambles, payments, authorization, and generic failures.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines React Query cache keys for competitions, results, profiles, admin data, and solve-session state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router routes, query client, theme provider, and links all main application pages including admin routes.
Admin-only guard that checks caller admin status and displays a loading spinner or access denied message accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and retry logic on errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and displays a login prompt or loading state when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Renders a clickable competition card showing name, status, dates, and participant info, navigating to the competition page.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, and conditional solve-flow mode, showing admin links when applicable.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Displays leaderboard results with ranks, user names, Ao5 times, and individual solves, linking to competitor profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Shows the user’s payment history with sorting, loading/error states, and detailed payment cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a dropdown menu for authenticated users showing profile info, navigation, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a user profile, collecting email and display name and submitting them via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: A React component managing a 15–17 second WCA-style inspection phase with ready, inspecting, and complete states.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a post-solve completion screen with navigation actions and instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Implements a solve timer with start/stop controls, live time display, and callback on completion.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads and caches Razorpay configuration from a JSON file with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload listener to warn users about leaving when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the authenticated actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Simulates a multi-step deployment process, tracking step status, errors, and diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls to fetch competitions, profiles, results, leaderboards, and session state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Defines leaderboard entry and computes Ao5 by handling penalties and DNF logic.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to a downloadable CSV with escaped values and formatted attempt times.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into short US locale dates.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates multi‑step deployment with callbacks, random failures, and error normalization.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for config files, Razorpay setup, connectivity, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay script and opens a configured checkout modal for payments.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab‑scoped solve session tokens using sessionStorage with helpers to store, retrieve, and clear.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times or DNF values into readable time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays all competitions for admins with actions to create, edit, lock/unlock, and delete. Uses dialogs and API mutations to manage competition lifecycle.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create a competition with metadata, events, and scrambles. Validates inputs and submits a structured CompetitionInput to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Loads an existing competition for editing and allows updating metadata, event selection, and scrambles. Submits updated CompetitionInput via admin API.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs preflight checks and a multi‑step deployment process with diagnostics viewing, copying, and downloading. Uses custom hooks to manage go‑live state and steps.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard with navigation to user, competition, results management, and quick actions like creating competitions or starting go‑live. Provides visual section cards for core admin areas.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin page for selecting competitions and events, viewing results, recalculating leaderboards, toggling visibility, and exporting CSVs.
Admin interface for listing users and performing actions like block, unblock, delete, reset competition status, and view solve history.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Competition detail page that fetches competition data, handles event selection, payment via Razorpay, and starts the competition flow.
Displays lists of running, upcoming, and completed competitions with loading states and category sections.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a competition leaderboard for a selected event, loading states, and user navigation to public profiles.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Leaderboards hub listing all competitions with status badges and navigation to each competition's leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Authenticated user profile page allowing editing of personal info and viewing payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Public profile page showing a user’s basic info and aggregated competition results and stats.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Handles the full solving flow including session recovery, inspection, timing, attempt submission, and navigation blocking. Integrates API queries to load session state, scrambles, and submit attempts.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-related data types including result input structure, public profile info, and user summary model.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Provides event labels, event list, and default event constants used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata with architecture notes, known issues, and feature history for the speedcubing platform.
